name: 林彥良
objective: This course is designed as an intensive teacher training program for students to become effective EFL teachers. Students are required to do the microteaching and present some selected chapters from the textbooks.
schedule:
A detailed syllabus will be distributed on the first day of class.
W1. Course Introduction
W2. No class
W3. Invited Talk: International Education
W4. Classroom Observation
W5. Testing & Assessment Design
W6. Language Learning and Technology
W7. No class
W8. Invited Talk: Bilingual Education (TBC) 
W9. Selected chapter presentation (1)
W10. Selected chapter presentation (2)
W11. Selected chapter presentation (3)
W12. Selected chapter presentation (4)
W13. Joint workshop organized by the Teacher Education Center
W14. Teaching Demonstration (1)
W15. Teaching Demonstration (2)
W16. Textbooks and Materials Evaluation/ Portfolio
W17. Invited Talk: Teaching Career Planning
W18. Final
scorePolicy:
Teaching Demonstration + Lesson Plans (drafts & revision): 30%
Teaching Intern & Report (classroom observantion/reflections/teaching video): 30% 
Game Design (5-min teaching demo): 15% 
Mock Interview & Portfolio (CV, biography, teaching philosophy, teaching materials, etc.): 15% 
Attendance and Participation: 10%
materials: 英文科教材教法專書 (五南出版)
